hero.title: Your No1 rent a car in Croatia

errors.returnDateBeforePickup: Return date cannot be before pick-up date

features.sectionDescription: We make car rental easy with transparent pricing, quick pickup, and exceptional customer support throughout your journey.

wideRange.title: A wide range of vehicles
wideRange.description: From compact city cars to spacious SUVs and luxury vehicles, we have the perfect car for every occasion and budget.

additionalServices.title: Additional services
additionalServices.description: Child seats, GPS navigation, additional drivers, and insurance options to make your journey comfortable and safe.

airports.title: Branches in 6 airports
airports.description: Zagreb, Split, Dubrovnik, Zadar, Pula, Rijeka

rentalStations.sectionDescription: With branches across Croatia's most popular destinations, we're always nearby. Find us at major airports and city centers for convenient pickup and drop-off.

benefits.freeCancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before pickup

footer.companyDescription: Your trusted rent-a-car partner in Croatia since 2010. Quality vehicles, transparent pricing, and exceptional service.

specialOffersPage.pageDescription: Take advantage of our exclusive offers and save on car rentals in Croatia.
specialOffersPage.metaDescription: Discover special car rental offers - Black Friday discounts, summer deals, weekend specials, and loyalty programs.

blackFriday.title: Black Friday -20% Discount!
blackFriday.description: The biggest sale of the year! Book any vehicle and get 20% off the total rental price.
blackFriday.terms: Valid for bookings from Nov 20 to Nov 30. Minimum rental duration 3 days.

summerSpecial.title: Summer Special - Free GPS!
summerSpecial.description: Explore Croatia this summer! Get free GPS navigation with any rental longer than 5 days.
summerSpecial.terms: Valid for rentals from June 1 to August 31. Minimum rental duration 5 days.

weekendGetaway.title: Weekend Getaway 15% Off
weekendGetaway.description: Perfect for short trips! Book a car for the weekend and save 15% on your rental.
weekendGetaway.terms: Valid for Friday pickup and Monday return. Minimum 2 nights.

loyaltyBonus.title: Loyalty Bonus - Extra Day Free!
loyaltyBonus.description: Thank you for your loyalty! Get an extra day completely free with any rental of 7+ days.
loyaltyBonus.terms: Valid for loyalty program members. Minimum rental duration 7 days.

earlyBird.title: Early Bird -10% Off
earlyBird.description: Plan ahead and save! Book 30 days before pickup and get 10% off your rental.
earlyBird.terms: Booking must be made at least 30 days before pickup date.

longTermRental.title: Long-Term Rental - Special Rates
longTermRental.description: Need a car for an extended period? Get monthly rentals at the best prices.
longTermRental.terms: Valid for rentals of 30+ days. Price depends on vehicle category.

fleet.pageDescription: Explore our diverse fleet of vehicles - from economical city cars to luxury sedans and spacious SUVs.
fleet.metaDescription: Browse our vehicle fleet - economy, compact, SUV and luxury cars for rent in Croatia.

officesPage.pageDescription: Find the nearest office for vehicle pickup and return. With locations across Croatia, we're always at your service.
officesPage.metaDescription: Find LastMinute Rent-a-Car offices in Croatia - Zagreb, Split, Dubrovnik, Zadar, Pula, Rijeka and more locations.

splitAirport.name: Split Airport
splitAirport.address: Cesta dr. Franje Tuđmana 1270, 21217 Kaštel Štafilić

customerSupport.pageDescription: How can we help you? Our support team is here for you 24/7.
customerSupport.metaDescription: Get help with your car rental. Contact our customer support team via phone, email, or visit our offices.

phone.title: Call Us
phone.description: Speak with our support team for urgent assistance and inquiries.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

office.title: Visit Us
office.description: Come to one of our offices across Croatia.

emergency.title: Emergency Roadside Assistance
emergency.description: Having trouble with your vehicle? Our roadside assistance is available 24/7 for all emergencies.

cancellation.question: How can I cancel my reservation?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel your reservation for free up to 48 hours before pickup. Log in to your account or contact us by phone or email with your booking number.

requirements.question: What are the requirements for renting a car?
requirements.answer: You must be at least 21 years old, have a valid driver's license (minimum 1 year), and a credit card in the main driver's name.

insurance.question: What insurance is included?
insurance.answer: All rentals include basic collision damage and theft protection. Additional options like full insurance with zero deductible are available during booking.

fuel.question: What is the fuel policy?
fuel.answer: We apply a full-to-full policy. You receive the vehicle with a full tank and return it with a full tank to avoid additional charges.

modification.question: Can I modify my reservation?
modification.answer: Yes, you can modify dates and booking details up to 24 hours before pickup at no additional charge, subject to availability.

documents.question: What documents do I need for vehicle pickup?
documents.answer: You need a valid driver's license, passport or ID card, and a credit card in the main driver's name for the deposit.

form.title: Send an Inquiry
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message. Our team will respond to you as soon as possible.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
